processGroups.comments: Collect files from directory and upload the data into staging tables.

labels.label: Read CSV files from /home/omar/source/to_process and process accordingly. Once the file is loaded in the database, the file is moved to /home/omar/source/processed.

entry.value: -- Transformation Script UPDATE `default`.Staging_GameRound SET bonus_amount_bet = 0 WHERE bonus_amount_bet IS NULL;

processGroups.name: Staging
